name: UpdatePropertyGroup
description:
Update fields in a specified property group.

This tool performs a partial update on a property group identified by {groupName} in HubSpot CRM. It overwrites the provided fields in the property group. Useful for modifying specific attributes within a property group without altering the entire group.

parameters.name: object_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of object in HubSpot CRM (e.g., contacts, companies).

parameters.name: property_group_name
parameters.description: The unique name of the property group to be updated in HubSpot CRM.

parameters.name: property_group_display_order
parameters.description: Set the display order of the property group. Use positive integers for ordering, or -1 to display after positive values.

value_schema.description: Property groups are displayed in order starting with the lowest positive integer value. Values of -1 will cause the property group to be displayed after any positive values.

parameters.name: property_group_label
parameters.description: A human-readable label for the property group in HubSpot.

value_schema.description: A human-readable label that will be shown in HubSpot.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: displayOrder
parameters.description: Property groups are displayed in order starting with the lowest positive integer value. Values of -1 will cause the property group to be displayed after any positive values.

value_schema.description: Property groups are displayed in order starting with the lowest positive integer value. Values of -1 will cause the property group to be displayed after any positive values.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: A human-readable label that will be shown in HubSpot.

value_schema.description: A human-readable label that will be shown in HubSpot.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
